title: OSE_434
source_name_ch1: Ovarian Surface Epithelia
treatment_protocol_ch1: Normal ovarian surface epithelial (OSE) cells were collected from ovaries at time of surgery using a Cytobrush ® Plus (Medscand) and immediately stabilized in RNAlater (Ambion) and stored at –20 degrees C.
extract_protocol_ch1: RNA was isolated with Trizol (Invitrogen) and purified with PicoPure RNA Isolation Kit (Arcturus). RNA quality was verified on the Bioanalyzer RNA Pico Chip (Agilent Technologies).
label_protocol_ch1: Affymetrix IVT Labeling Kit
hyb_protocol: as per manufacturer's protocol
description: Ovarian surface epithelia brushing from ovaries described by pathology as within normal limits.
data_processing: MAS 5.0 via Affymetrix Expression Console (TM) Software Version 1.1
contact_department: Center for Cancer Research and Therapeutic Development

title: CEPI_Ic_317
source_name_ch1: Laser Capture Microdissected Serous Ovarian Cancer Epithelia
treatment_protocol_ch1: Following pathological verification, a serous papillary epithelial cancer sample was embedded in cryomatrix (Shandon).  Seven micron frozen sections were cut and attached to uncharged microscope slides for each sample.  Immediately following dehydration and staining (HistoGene, LCM Frozen Section Staining Kit, Arcturus), slides were processed in an Autopix‘ instrument (Arcturus) for laser capture microdissection (LCM) of cells to CapSure Macro LCM Caps.  Approximately 30,000 epithelia were collected from each cancer sample.
extract_protocol_ch1: RNA was isolated with Trizol (Invitrogen) and purified with PicoPure RNA Isolation Kit (Arcturus). RNA quality was verified on the Bioanalyzer RNA Pico Chip (Agilent Technologies).
label_protocol_ch1: Total RNA from the above extractions was processed using the RiboAmp OA or HS kit (Arcturus) in conjunction with the IVT Labeling Kit from Affymetrix, to produce an amplified, biotin-labeled mRNA suitable for hybridizing to GeneChip Probe Arrays (Affymetrix).
hyb_protocol: Labeled mRNA was hybridized to GeneChip Human Genome U133 Plus 2.0 Arrays in the GeneChip Hybridization oven 640, further processed with the GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 and scanned with the GeneChip Scanner.
description: Serous ovarian tumor tissues were placed in cryotubes and immediately (<1 minute) frozen in liquid nitrogen following resection.
data_processing: MAS 5.0 via Affymetrix Expression Console (TM) Software Version 1.1
contact_department: Center for Cancer Research and Therapeutic Development
